mapper.select: select * from CLUB_CALENDAR cn1,(select CLUB_CALENDAR_NUM from CLUB_CALENDAR_APPLY where USER_ID= '${userId}')cn2 where cn2.CLUB_CALENDAR_NUM = cn1.CLUB_CALENDAR_NUM ;
SELECT cr.*, us.user_image FROM club_calendar_review cr , users us WHERE club_calendar_review_num = #{clubCalenderReviewNum} AND cr.user_id = us.user_id
mapper.sql:
SELECT cr.* , us.user_image, cc.location, cc.calendar_title FROM club_calendar_review cr , users us, club_calendar cc WHERE cr.user_id = us.user_id AND cr.club_calendar_num = cc.club_calendar_num AND cr.board_category = #{boardCategory} AND cr.review_range = #{reviewRange}
AND review_title LIKE '%'||#{search.searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY club_calendar_review_num DESC
ORDER BY like_count DESC NULLS LAST
ORDER BY view_count DESC NULLS LAST
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO files(file_num, board_num, board_category, file_name) VALUES (seq_files.NEXTVAL, #{boardNum}, #{boardCategory}, #{fileName})
